name: INFINITE TILES - Be Fast!
description:
Train your skills, reflexes and accuracy in this game! Get the best score in every level to make your way up the rankings, earn coins and unlock special kits!


FEATURES:
• Many levels
• Levels inspired by famous hits
• High quality tracks
• Multitouch
• Addicting, fun and challenging
• Play in the right rhythm to get the best score
• Don’t miss any tile!
• Works in all screen sizes – Smartphones and Tablets

Want to send us a suggestion?
Send an e-mail to hello@opalastudios.com

Infinity Tiles - You can music.
